overview: After his departure from the Televen network on June 10th, 2014, Luis Chataing decided to make a tour of theater performances with the crew of "ChataingTV" to thank the viewers for their support and to transmit into the hearts of Venezuelans the determination to stand up and keep fighting against adversities, and defend freedom of speech.
tagline: Chataing disappeared from television, but only from television.
title: Fuera Del Aire: La Película
